comment:
* Represents a remote transition animation and information required to run it (eg. the app thread
 * that needs to be boosted).
 * @hide

variables.name: mRemoteTransition
variables.comment: The actual remote-transition interface used to run the transition animation.

variables.name: mAppThread
variables.comment: The application thread that will be running the remote transition.

variables.name: mDebugName
variables.comment: A name for this that can be used for debugging.

methods.name: public IBinder asBinder()
methods.comment: Get the IBinder associated with the underlying IRemoteTransition.

methods.name: public IRemoteTransition getRemoteTransition()
methods.comment: * The actual remote-transition interface used to run the transition animation.

methods.name: public IApplicationThread getAppThread()
methods.comment: * The application thread that will be running the remote transition.

methods.name: public String getDebugName()
methods.comment: * A name for this that can be used for debugging.

methods.name: public RemoteTransition setRemoteTransition(@NonNull IRemoteTransition value)
methods.comment: * The actual remote-transition interface used to run the transition animation.

methods.name: public RemoteTransition setAppThread(@NonNull IApplicationThread value)
methods.comment: * The application thread that will be running the remote transition.

methods.name: public RemoteTransition setDebugName(@NonNull String value)
methods.comment: * A name for this that can be used for debugging.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)
